channel.title: Players DONT SAVE! HELP PLZ! (A.S.A.P)
channel.description:
Hello, i was making a pvp server today (all pvp like runecape pvp world) and i came to test it and i thought it was GRATE! (im using PVP - Jinrake) i added some stuff to it that took a wile and did some other things all took about 30mins (not that long but i CBA doing it again) any way i came to try it and it doesnt save!!! it doesnt even have a character File or anything to do with saving players! this sucks because i did a bit of work and i realy like the server so does any 1 know how i could FIX this or add player save to my server????? if you know how PLZ PLZ reply!
-Taylor-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 25, 2009, 12:43:03 pm[/size][hr]OMFG YAY!!!! i fixed this error (lol i added a characters file=)) plz can some 1 close or delete or lock??? sorry for this =(

item.title: Players DONT SAVE! HELP PLZ! (A.S.A.P)
